content:
Many online retailers and local stores offer customization options for display cases, including engraving and team-specific colors. Here's what I found:

**Online Retailers**

1. **Amazon**: Some Amazon sellers offer customization options, such as engraving, for certain display cases. Look for products with "Customizable" or "Personalized" in the title or description.
2. **Steiner Sports**: Steiner Sports offers a range of customization options, including engraving, for many of their display cases. They also offer team-specific colors and logos for many MLB teams.
3. **Fanatics**: Fanatics offers customization options, including engraving and team-specific colors, for some of their display cases. They also have a "Custom Shop" section where you can design your own display case.
4. **DisplayIt**: DisplayIt offers customization options, including engraving, for many of their display cases. They also offer a range of team-specific colors and logos.

**Local Stores**

1. **Framing Stores**: Local framing stores often offer customization options, including engraving, for display cases. They may also be able to match team-specific colors or create a custom design.
2. **Sports Memorabilia Stores**: Some sports memorabilia stores may offer customization options, including engraving, for display cases. They may also have team-specific colors and logos available.
3. **Hobby Stores**: Hobby stores that offer custom framing services may also be able to customize display cases with engraving or team-specific colors.

**Tips for Customization**

1. **Check the product description**: When shopping online, check the product description to see if customization options are available.
2. **Contact the seller**: If you're unsure about customization options, contact the seller directly to ask about their capabilities.
3. **Check for additional fees**: Customization options may incur additional fees, so be sure to check the pricing before making a purchase.
4. **Provide clear instructions**: If you're ordering a customized display case, make sure to provide clear instructions on the engraving or design you want.

By exploring these customization options, you can create a unique display case that perfectly complements your signed baseball and showcases your team spirit!
